name: Emperor's Power
Lore: 'From his throne room aboard the second Death Star, Emperor Palpatine monitors activity throughout the galaxy.',
Text: 'Deploy on your Throne Room. You may not Force drain here. While Emperor here, opponent''s characters are deploy +2 to Death Star II sites and, one per turn, you may lose Effect (or 1 Force from top of Reserve Deck) to add one battle destiny anywhere. (Immune to Alter.)',
